## Introduction

In this section, you'll get to put into practice the multiple linear regression skills you've developed.

### Learning goals

In this section, you will learn...

-   Fit and interpret multiple linear regression models with main and interaction effects.
-   Compare multiple linear regression models.
    -   sub-point 1
    -   sub-point 2
-   Reason around multiple linear regression concepts.
-   Continue developing a workflow for reproducible data analysis.

### Packages

The following packages will be during this section.

```{r warning=FALSE}
#| message: false

library(tidyverse)
library(tsibble)
library(tsibbledata)
```
